response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us, reflecting its exceptional quality and craftsmanship. Given its significance, we believe it's worth considering a fair valuation that respects its true worth.

We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a strategic midpoint between our internal valuation and your perceived value, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction.

Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and interests. We are open to discussing further details or any adjustments that might facilitate a mutually beneficial agreement.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
